agents.name: Brimstone
agents.biography: Joining from the USA, Brimstone's orbital arsenal ensures his team always has the advantage.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Deploy a beacon that grants RapidFire to players.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that creates a lingering fire zone.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Deploy long-lasting smoke clouds via a tactical map.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Launch a high-damage orbital laser strike.

agents.name: Phoenix
agents.biography: Starring from the UK, Phoenix's star power shines through in his fighting style, igniting the battlefield.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Equip a wall of fire that blocks vision and damages players.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: Equip a flare orb that takes a curving path and detonate into a brilliant light.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: Throw a fireball that creates a zone of fire that heals Phoenix or damages enemies.

abilities.name: Run It Back
abilities.description: Mark your location. If you die or the timer expires, you will be reborn at that location.

agents.name: Sage
agents.biography: The stronghold of China, Sage creates safety for herself and her team wherever she goes.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: Deploy a solid wall that can be rotated.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: Launch an orb that creates a field that slows players caught inside.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: Heal an ally or yourself over time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: Target a friendly corpse to bring them back to life with full health.

agents.name: Sova
agents.biography: Born from the eternal winter of Russia's tundra, Sova tracks, finds, and eliminates enemies with ruthless efficiency.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploy a pilotable drone to scout and fire darts that reveal enemies.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fire an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of energy on impact.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fire a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter, revealing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Fire up to three long-range energy blasts that pierce walls and reveal enemies.

agents.name: Viper
agents.biography: The American chemist, Viper deploys an array of poisonous chemical devices to control the battlefield.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that explodes into a pool of damaging acid.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: Throw a gas emitter that creates a poisonous cloud.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: Deploy a long line of gas emitters that create a tall wall of toxic gas.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.description: Emit a massive toxic cloud that reduces vision and max health of enemies inside.

agents.name: Cypher
agents.biography: The Moroccan information broker, Cypher is a surveillance network of one, keeping tabs on enemies at all times.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Throw a remote activation trap that creates a zone blocking vision and slowing enemies.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Deploy a remote camera that can fire tracking darts.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Place a trap between two walls that restrains and reveals enemies.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: Use on a dead enemy to reveal the location of all living enemies.

agents.name: Breach
agents.biography: The bionic Swede, Breach fires powerful blasts through terrain to control the battlefield.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Fire a slow-acting burst through a wall that deals heavy damage.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: Set a fast-acting charge through walls that blinds all players.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: Set a seismic blast that dazes all players in its zone.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Fire a cascading quake that dazes and knocks up anyone in its path.

agents.name: Omen
agents.biography: A phantom of a memory, Omen hunts in the shadows. He renders enemies blind, teleports across the field, then lets paranoia take hold.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Send out a shadowy projectile that nearsights and deafens enemies.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: Cast a shadow orb that creates a sphere of shadow smoke.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: Teleport to any location on the map.

agents.name: Raze
agents.biography: Raze explodes onto the field with her arsenal of explosive gadgets, bringing mayhem wherever she goes.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: Deploy a bot that chases down enemies and explodes.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: Throw a satchel that can be detonated to damage and displace.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: Throw a cluster grenade that deals damage in multiple blasts.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: Equip a rocket launcher that deals massive area damage.

agents.name: Jett
agents.biography: Representing South Korea, Jett's agile style lets her take risks no one else can.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: Throw a projectile that expands into a vision-blocking cloud.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: Instantly propel Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Dash in the direction she is moving (requires 2 kills to refresh).

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Equip highly accurate throwing knives that recharge on kills.

agents.name: Reyna
agents.biography: Forged in the heart of Mexico, Reyna dominates single combat, feasting on every kill she effects.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: Equip an ethereal eye that Nearsights all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consume a Soul Orb to rapidly heal for a short duration.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: Consume a Soul Orb to become intangible for a short duration.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: Enter a frenzy, increasing firing speed and granting infinite ability charges.

agents.name: Killjoy
agents.biography: The genius of Germany, Killjoy secures the battlefield with her array of gadgets.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that deploys a damaging swarm of nanobots.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: Deploy a bot that hunts down enemies in range and applies Vulnerable.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: Deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180-degree cone.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: Deploy a device that detains all enemies caught in its radius after a long windup.

agents.name: Skye
agents.biography: Hailing from Australia, Skye and her band of beasts trail-blaze the way through hostile territory.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Heal allies in range and line of sight.

abilities.name: Trailblazer
abilities.description: Control a Tasmanian tiger to scout and concuss enemies.

abilities.name: Guiding Light
abilities.description: Equip a hawk spirit that can be guided and detonated to flash enemies.

abilities.name: Seekers
abilities.description: Send out three seekers to track and nearsight the nearest enemies.

agents.name: Yoru
agents.biography: Japanese native Yoru rips holes straight through reality to infiltrate enemy lines unseen.

abilities.name: Fakeout
abilities.description: Deploy an echo that mimics footsteps or a clone that flashes on death.

abilities.name: Blindside
abilities.description: Throw a fragment that bounces off surfaces to create a flash.

abilities.name: Gatecrash
abilities.description: Deploy a rift tether to teleport to its location later.

abilities.name: Dimensional Drift
abilities.description: Mask yourself and enter Yoru's dimension, becoming invisible and invulnerable.

agents.name: Astra
agents.biography: Ghanaian agent Astra harnesses the energies of the cosmos to reshape battlefields to her whim.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Pull players towards the center before it explodes, applying Fragile.

abilities.name: Nova Pulse
abilities.description: Charge a star to detonate a pulse that concusses all players in its area.

abilities.name: Nebula
abilities.description: Transform a star into a smoke cloud.

abilities.name: Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: Create a wall that blocks bullets and heavily dampens audio.

agents.name: KAY/O
agents.biography: KAY/O is a machine of war built for a single purpose: neutralizing radiants.

abilities.name: FRAG/ment
abilities.description: Throw an explosive fragment that sticks to the floor and pulses damaging energy.

abilities.name: FLASH/drive
abilities.description: Throw a flash grenade that explodes after a short fuse.

abilities.name: ZERO/point
abilities.description: Throw a blade that suppresses anyone in the radius of its explosion.

abilities.name: NULL/cmd
abilities.description: Emit pulses that suppress enemies and allow KAY/O to be revived if downed.

agents.name: Chamber
agents.biography: Well-dressed and well-armed, French weapons designer Chamber expels aggressors with deadly precision.

abilities.name: Trademark
abilities.description: Place a trap that scans for enemies and slows them.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.description: Equip a heavy pistol with high precision.

abilities.name: Rendezvous
abilities.description: Place a teleport anchor to quickly return to its range.

abilities.name: Tour De Force
abilities.description: Summon a powerful custom sniper rifle that kills enemies in one hit.

agents.name: Neon
agents.biography: Filipino agent Neon surges forward at shocking speeds, discharging bursts of bio-electric radiance.

abilities.name: Fast Lane
abilities.description: Fire two energy lines that create walls of static electricity.

abilities.name: Relay Bolt
abilities.description: Throw an energy bolt that bounces once and electrifies the ground with a concussive blast.

abilities.name: High Gear
abilities.description: Channel Neon's power for increased speed and an electric slide.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Unleash Neon's full power and speed for a short duration, firing lethal lightning beams.

agents.name: Fade
agents.biography: Turkish bounty hunter Fade unleashes the power of raw nightmare to seize enemy secrets.

abilities.name: Prowler
abilities.description: Send out a creature that tracks enemies or trails and nearsights them.

abilities.name: Seize
abilities.description: Launch an orb of nightmare ink that traps enemies and decays them.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Throw an entity that reveals the location of enemies in its line of sight.

abilities.name: Nightfall
abilities.description: Send out a wave of nightmare energy that deafens, decays, and trails enemies.

agents.name: Harbor
agents.biography: Hailing from India, Harbor wields ancient technology with dominion over water to shield his team.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description: Send a wave of water that rolls forward and through walls, slowing players.

abilities.name: Cove
abilities.description: Throw a sphere of shielding water that blocks bullets.

abilities.name: High Tide
abilities.description: Equip a wall of water that Harbor can guide and bend.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: Summon a geyser pool on the ground that strikes enemies with concussive blasts.

agents.name: Gekko
agents.biography: Gekko leads a tight-knit crew of calamitous creatures, charging forward to scatter enemies.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: Throw Mosh like a grenade; it duplicates and explodes in a wide area.

abilities.name: Wingman
abilities.description: Send Wingman to look for enemies or plant/defuse the Spike.

abilities.name: Dizzy
abilities.description: Fire Dizzy into the air to blind enemies with plasma blasts.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.description: Control Thrash to lunge at enemies and detain them.

agents.name: Deadlock
agents.biography: Norwegian operative Deadlock deploys an array of cutting-edge nanowire to secure the battlefield.

abilities.name: GravNet
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that forces enemies to crouch and move slowly.

abilities.name: Sonic Sensor
abilities.description: Deploy a sensor that concusses enemies if they make noise.

abilities.name: Barrier Mesh
abilities.description: Throw a disc that generates a barrier blocking character movement.

abilities.name: Annihilation
abilities.description: Unleash a pulse of nanowires that captures the first enemy hit in a cocoon.

agents.name: Iso
agents.biography: A Chinese fixer for hire, Iso falls into a flow state to dismantle opposition with prismatic energy.

abilities.name: Contingency
abilities.description: Assemble a wall of energy that blocks bullets and moves forward.

abilities.name: Undercut
abilities.description: Fire a molecular bolt that can pass through walls and applies Vulnerable.

abilities.name: Double Tap
abilities.description: Start a flow timer. Downed enemies drop orbs that, when shot, grant a shield.

abilities.name: Kill Contract
abilities.description: Pull yourself and an enemy into an interdimensional arena for a 1v1 duel.

agents.name: Clove
agents.biography: Scottish mischief-maker Clove makes enemies wonder if death is really the end.

abilities.name: Pick-me-up
abilities.description: Absorb life energy from a fallen enemy for haste and temporary health.

abilities.name: Meddle
abilities.description: Throw a fragment of immortality essence that decays targets.

abilities.name: Ruse
abilities.description: Deploy smoke clouds that can be cast even after death.

abilities.name: Not Dead Yet
abilities.description: Resurrect yourself after dying, with a short window to get a kill to stay alive.

agents.name: Vyse
agents.biography: A metallic mastermind who uses liquid metal to trap and disarm her enemies.

abilities.name: Razorvine
abilities.description: Deploy a nest of invisible liquid metal that slows and damages enemies.

abilities.name: Shear
abilities.description: Place a trip that creates an indestructible wall when an enemy crosses it.

abilities.name: Arc Rose
abilities.description: Place a rose that can be activated to blind all enemies looking at it.

abilities.name: Steel Garden
abilities.description: Unleash a torrent of metal that jams the primary weapons of enemies in range.

agents.name: Tejo
agents.biography: A Colombian expert in heavy ordinance and tactical surveillance.

abilities.name: Guided Charge
abilities.description: Remotely detonated explosive that sticks to surfaces.

abilities.name: Sonic Sensor
abilities.description: Detects and reveals enemies through sound vibrations.

abilities.name: Flare Recon
abilities.description: Fires a scouting flare that marks enemies in line of sight.

abilities.name: Ground Zero
abilities.description: Seismic strike that concusses and decays enemies in a massive zone.

agents.name: Waylay
agents.biography: A shadow-stepping duelist focused on psychological warfare and positioning.

abilities.name: Afterimage
abilities.description: Create a stationary decoy that explodes when shot.

abilities.name: Echo Slash
abilities.description: Dash forward leaving a damaging trail behind.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Become briefly untargetable while moving through obstacles.

abilities.name: Mirrored Death
abilities.description: Splits into three identical clones, only one being the real Waylay.

agents.name: Veto
agents.biography: An advanced tactician who specializes in denying area access and utility usage.

abilities.name: Grid Lock
abilities.description: Creates a digital floor that prevents ability usage for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Denial Pylon
abilities.description: Deploys a pylon that shoots down incoming projectiles.

abilities.name: Void Screen
abilities.description: Deploy a transparent wall that blocks passage but allows vision.

abilities.name: Total Embargo
abilities.description: Drains the ultimate points and ability charges of all enemies in a radius.
